description: Captured on camera is the unbelievable moment a woman was filmed knitting behind the wheel while travelling down a main road in the city of Novosibirsk in south-central Russia.
title: Moment woman is filmed KNITTING while driving in Russia
title_page: Moment woman is filmed KNITTING while driving in Russia | Daily Mail Online
text:
Staying focussed on the road while behind the wheel of a car is very important.
But this woman in Russia does not appear to have received the safety memo, if this video is anything to go by.
Captured on camera is the unbelievable moment a woman was filmed knitting behind the wheel while travelling down a main road.
Astonished motorists watched open-mouthed as the lady drove at speeds of up to 30mph while doing crochet
Astonished motorists in the city of Novosibirsk in south-central Russia watched open-mouthed as the woman drove at speeds of up to 30mph while doing crochet.
The footage shows the woman in a Smart car ploughing on through heavy traffic on the dual carriageway.
The driver appears to be using both hands to hold the needles and wool while she works on her creation.
And at times she is not even looking at the road ahead as she concentrates on not dropping her equipment.
Dangerous multi-tasking: Despite being distracted the woman keeps up with the bumper-to-bumper traffic
The driver appeared to be using both hands to hold the needles and wool while she worked on her creation
But despite being distracted the woman keeps up with the bumper-to-bumper traffic.
The video was captured on the mobile phone of a fellow motorist, who was driving in a car in the next lane.
The clip was posted on Russian social media website Vkontakte, and was used as an example of bizarre driving.
One viewer commented: 'What she's doing is so dangerous.'
